description:
Blast through a thrilling rogue-lite campaign for 1-4 players where different environments, enemies and mission types are blended together. No two playthroughs will be the same!

LIMITLESS SOLO & CO-OP PLAY – Blast through campaigns solo or in 2-4 player co-op (supports online and local wireless play).
DEVASTATING ARSENAL – Unleash destructive weapons and awesome special equipment, from laser-guided missiles and artillery to EMPs and shield boosts.
CUTTING-EDGE UPGRADES – Unlock ever more powerful tanks, weapons and special equipment and pick from hundreds of deadly combinations! 
FIGHT WITH STYLE – Customise your tank with new skins, cockpit bobbleheads, and horns, now all included in the Gold Edition!
CLASSIC MODE – Travel back to the 80s with the retro-inspired Classic Mode, featuring Battlezone’s original two-track controls and worldwide leaderboards!
name: Battlezone Gold Edition
